signals.reason: Recent candles show a clear downtrend with consecutive red bars, EMA9 below EMA21, bearish MACD histogram, RSI likely below 50, and price pressing toward the lower Bollinger Band. Stochastic is in the lower zone, indicating continued weakness.

RSI приблизно 28 (перепроданий), MACD негативний з розширеним гістограмом, ціна торкається нижньої смуги Bollinger, EMA9 нижче EMA21, Stochastic в зоні перепроданості, чітка низхідна динаміка за останні 8 свічок і переважають bearish‑cвічки

RSI around 58 (neutral‑slightly overbought), MACD shows a bearish crossover, price has slipped below EMA9 and EMA21, recent candles moved from the upper Bollinger Band toward the middle band, and a bearish candle pattern (higher high followed by a lower close) indicates short‑term downside pressure
